member.name: T:SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate
member.summary: Stores a generic location

member.name: F:SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate.NorthPole
member.summary: A coordinate that represents the geographic North Pole

member.name: F:SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate.SouthPole
member.summary: A coordinate that represents the geographic South Pole

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate.ToEci(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Converts this coordinate to an ECI one
member.param: The time for the ECI frame
member.returns: The coordinate in an ECI reference frame with the supplied time

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate.ToGeodetic
member.summary: Converts this coordinate to a geodetic one
member.returns: The coordinate in a geodetic reference frame

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate.ToMaidenhead(SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.MaidenheadPrecision,SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.MaidenheadStandard)
member.summary: Converts this coordinate to its Maidenhead Locator System representation, disregarding altitude
member.param: The precision of the conversion, which defines the number of pairs in the conversion
The conversion standard to use for the 5th pair
member.returns: The Maidenhead representation string

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate.ToDegreesMinutesSeconds
member.summary: Converts this coordinate to its Degrees-Minutes-Seconds (DMS) representation, disregarding altitude
member.returns: The Degrees-Minutes-Seconds representation string

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate.ToSphericalEcef
member.summary: Converts this coordinate to an ECEF one, assuming a spherical earth
member.returns: A spherical ECEF coordinate vector

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate.GetFootprint
member.summary: Calculates the visibility radius (km) of the satellite by which any distances from this coordinate less than the radius are able to see this coordinate
member.returns: The visibility radius, in kilometers

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate.GetFootprintAngle
member.summary: Calculates the visibility radius (radians) of the satellite by which any distances from this coordinate less than the radius are able to see this coordinate
member.returns: The visibility radius as an angle across Earth's surface

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate.GetFootprintBoundary(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a list of geodetic coordinates which define the bounds of the visibility footprint at a specific time
member.param: The number of points in the resulting circle
member.returns: A list of geodetic coordinates for the specified time

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate.DistanceTo(SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate)
member.summary: Calculates the Great Circle distance (km) to another coordinate
member.returns: The distance between the coordinates, in kilometers

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate.AngleTo(SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate)
member.summary: Calculates the Great Circle distance as an angle to another geodetic coordinate, ignoring altitude
member.returns: The distance between the coordinates as an angle across Earth's surface

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate.CanSee(SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate)
member.summary: Returns true if there is line-of-sight between this coordinate and the supplied one by checking if this coordinate is within the footprint of the other
member.returns: True if there is line-of-sight between this coordinate and the supplied one

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate.Observe(SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Calculates the look angles between this coordinate and target
member.returns: The topocentric angles between this coordinate and another

member.name: T:SGPdotNET.Observation.GroundStation
member.summary: A representation of a ground station that can observe satellites

member.name: P:SGPdotNET.Observation.GroundStation.Location
member.summary: The location of the ground station

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.Observation.GroundStation.#ctor(SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate)
member.summary: Creates a new ground station at the specified location
member.param: The location of the ground station. Cannot be null

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.Observation.GroundStation.Observe(SGPdotNET.Observation.Satellite,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.TimeSpan,SGPdotNET.Util.Angle,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a list of all of the predicted observations within the specified time period for this GroundStation.
member.param: The time step for the prediction simulation
The minimum elevation. Default is Angle.Zero.
Whether to clip the start time of the first satellite visibility period to start, if applicable. Default is true
Whether to clip the end time of the last satellite visibility period to end, if applicable. Default is false
The number of second decimal places to calculate for the start and end times. Cannot be greater than 7 (i.e. greater than tick resolution). Default is 3.
member.returns: A list of observations where an AOS is seen at or after the start parameter
member.exception: Thrown if start is greater than or equal to end, deltaTime is non-positive, resolution is not in range 0-7, or minElevation is greater than 90Â°

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.Observation.GroundStation.Observe(SGPdotNET.Observation.Satellite,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Observes a satellite at an instant in time, relative to this GroundStation
member.returns: A list of observations where an AOS is seen at or after the start parameter

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.Observation.GroundStation.IsVisible(SGPdotNET.CoordinateSystem.Coordinate,SGPdotNET.Util.Angle,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Tests whether or not a satellite is above a specified elevation
member.param: The minimum elevation required to be "visible"
The time the check is occurring
member.returns: True if the satellite is above the specified elevation, false otherwise

member.summary: Determines if the satellite is geostationary, based on the given thresholds

The maximum eccentricity the orbit may have before it is no longer considered geostationary

member.summary: Stores a period during which a satellite is visible to a ground station

member.name: T:SGPdotNET.TLE.CachingRemoteTleProvider
member.summary: Provides a class to retrieve TLEs from a remote network resource

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.TLE.CachingRemoteTleProvider.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String,System.Uri[])
member.summary: Constructor, defaulting to max-age of 24 hours
member.param: True if the TLEs contain a third, preceding name line (3le format)
The file in which the TLEs will be locally cached
The sources that should be queried

member.name: M:SGPdotNET.TLE.CachingRemoteTleProvider.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.TimeSpan,System.String,System.Uri[])
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: True if the TLEs contain a third, preceding name line (3le format)
The maximum time to keep TLEs cached before updating them from the remote
The file in which the TLEs will be locally cached

The sources that should be queried. If the sources change after a cache has already been written, the cached TLEs will take priority over the new sources. Consider having the filename reflect the source it's caching.
